result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

1:13 PM Defendant Joseph John Johnson appeared by video, in custody from the TC Jail.  Attorney Christine Kuczynski appeared by phone for Joseph John Johnson.  Prosecuting attorney John Harrison Sacia in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defense advised of reason for non-appearance, had contacted defense counsel at 3:30 that day. Defendant turned self in. Court quashes warrant. Defense requests to reinstate bond. State has no objection. Court grants.
Status Conference scheduled for November 17, 2022 at 09:00 am.

2:08 PM Defense unable to get in touch. State requests WA/FO of any bonds posted. Court grants.

1:33 PM Prosecuting attorney John Sacia in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Joseph John Johnson not in court.  Attorney Christine Kuczynski in court for Joseph John Johnson. Defense advised spoke with defendant this afternoon to go over the waiver. Defense advised defendant was placed on new medication that makes him drowsy, was uncomfortable proceeding with waiver, requesting to reschedule. State has no objection, requests defendant to appear in person. Court grants.
Waiver of Prelim scheduled for April 27, 2022 at 11:00 am.

Defendant can hear okay, okay appearing by phone, received no threats/promises to appear by phone. Court finds def KVI waives personal appearance. Court advised defendant of rights/max penalties. Defendant waives reading of complaint and enters NG pleas. Defendant KVI waives time limits to PH. Defense requests to set for Waiver of Prelim. Court approves remote appearance. WOPH set. Bond cont.
